response.content:
Hi Ricardo,

Thank you for the review.
If you are disappointed that you get the error as you asked in Q&A please go check my answer - https://www.udemy.com/course/react-full-stack-serverless-ecommerce/learn/#questions/16063880/. The error happens because you have your own typo not because of the code at all.

results.content:
Absolutely great course!
He teaches us how to make a real life app thoroughly.
Actually this is not a short course, but nothing is wasted.
If you want to learn how to make a large react app, not just boring ToDoList, I highly recommend this course. 
Thank you!
